header1: To be the leading consulting firm in Central Asia, fostering a robust and inclusive Islamic finance ecosystem that empowers individuals and businesses, and promotes sustainable economic growth in the region
header2: The primary goal of Al-Muamalat Consulting is to contribute to the comprehensive development of Islamic finance in Uzbekistan and Central Asia, considering the interests of the countries and in accordance with existing regulations.
mission: Markaziy Osiyoda etakchi konsalting kompaniyasi bo'lish, kuchli va inklyuziv Islom moliya ekotizimini rivojlantirish orqali shaxslar va bizneslarni qo`llab-quvvatlash hamda mintaqaning barqaror iqtisodiy o'sishiga hissa qo'shish.
blog3: International expert. Director of Advisory Unit
text: Tursunov Iskandar holds a master’s degree in Islamic finance from INCEIF University in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. He also studied Islamic finance at Istanbul Sabahattin Zaim University in Türkiye. He has many years of experience in the banking, insurance, and government sectors.
text1: Dr. Mezbah Uddin Ahmed is a distinguished researcher at ISRA Research Management Centre, a part of INCEIF University established by Bank Negara Malaysia (Central Bank of Malaysia). He also provides various Islamic Finance advisory services through ISRA Consulting.
text3: Hayot Azimov Financial engineering, risk management and project management practitioner for past 15 years. Experienced in establishing Islamic Banks and Banking windows in Malaysia. Active interests in Islamic Fintech and blockchain application.
text4: Xamid Raxmatov earned a master's degree in Islamic finance from International Islamic University Malaysia University in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. He has extensive expertise in the financial services, insurance, and the state industries.
text5: Oripov Sarvar holds an MBA in Finance from Cardiff Metropolitan University in the UK. He has many years of experience in financial management within the private sector. He is also an expert in halal investments and stock market trading.
text6: Waqf as a Catalyst for Economic Development: How is Uzbekistan Utilizing It?

text13: Dr. A’lam Ilhomovich Asadov, PhD, CSAA is an Assistant Professor of Finance at Prince Sultan University in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. He holds a PhD in Islamic Finance from INCEIF University and a CSAA certification from AAOIFI.
text14: Dr. Ramazan Yildirim specializes in corporate governance, Business Process Management (BPM), and Corporate Risk Management (CRM). He has worked with global firms like Siemens, SAP, and SABIC.

team13-blog: Expert in Waqf and Islamic Finance
team13-text: Dr. Magda Ismail, a Ph.D. graduate from IIUM, is an Associate Professor at INCEIF University (Malaysia) specializing in waqf and Islamic finance. She has advised global institutions like UNICEF and ISRA on waqf-linked sukuk, cash waqf, and financial inclusion.
team12-text: Prof. Dr. Aishath Muneeza is a leader in Islamic finance. She was the first female Deputy Minister of the Ministry of Islamic Affairs and Ministry of Finance and Treasury in Maldives. She helped create Maldives’ first Shariah-compliant microfinance scheme and played a key role in structuring Sukuk and Islamic treasury products.
team11-text: Professor Monzer Kahf is a renowned authority in Islamic finance and economics, with decades of global experience as a consultant, trainer, and academic. He has advised international organizations, central banks, and financial institutions on Sharia-compliant frameworks, risk management, and product development.
Oʻzbekistonda islom moliyasi qay ahvolda: What is the state of Islamic finance in Uzbekistan?
The path to Islamic finance ecosystem is clear...
text17: Mr. Gayrat Rakhmanberdiev is an experienced corporate consultant and legal expert with over 16 years in corporate governance and legal advisory.
maxsus_text: He is an Islamic scholar, deputy imam, and researcher with extensive experience in Islamic sciences, hadith, and tafsir. He began his educational career in the city of Margilan. Later, in 1997, he completed both his bachelor's and master's degree programs at the Darul Ulum Islamic University in Karachi, Islamic Republic of Pakistan. He also pursued his studies at an Islamic educational institution in Andijan. He served for a period as an imam-khatib and, for many years, has worked as a deputy imam and researcher. Since 2020, he has been employed as a junior research officer at the Imom Termiziy International Scientific-Research Center. He conducts active research in the fields of Islamic sciences, hadith, and tafsir.
maxsus_text2: He is an Islamic scholar, imam-khatib, and educator with extensive practical and theoretical experience. For many years, he has been actively engaged in religious education, Islamic jurisprudence (fiqh), and imamate. He began his educational career at the Khoja Ahror Vali Secondary Special Islamic School in the Samarkand region and later pursued his studies at the Tashkent Islamic Institute. In addition, he completed his master's degree at the Tashkent State University of Uzbek Language and Literature named after Alisher Navoi. Since 2017, he has served as the imam-khatib at the Siroj-Solih Jami Mosque in the Olmazor district of Tashkent and concurrently works as a senior lecturer at the Tashkent Islamic Institute. He conducts active research in Islamic sciences, Hanafi jurisprudence (fiqh), and family issues.
text18: Oybek Khojimamatov holds a B.S. in Accounting from the University of South Florida, USA, and has earned CPSS and CPFAS certifications from AAOIFI. He has a strong foundation in accounting and Islamic finance.

baxtiyor_text: Bakhtiyorjon Fayzullaev holds bachelor's degree in International Economics and Management from the University of World Economy and Diplomacy.
four_text: CSAA consists of two main modules (in the new AAOIFI modular structure):
CPSS — Certificate of Proficiency in Sha: CPSS — Certificate of Proficiency in Sharia Standards
CPAAGE — Certificate of Proficiency in A: CPAAGE — Certificate of Proficiency in Audit, Assurance, Governance and Ethics
AAOIFI tomonidan ishlab chiqilgan barcha: AAOIFI tomonidan ishlab chiqilgan barcha Shari’ah standartlarini o‘rganishni qamrab oladi.
Shariat auditi, boshqaruv va etika bo‘yi: Shariat auditi, boshqaruv va etika bo‘yicha AAOIFI standartlarini, jumladan Etika kodeksini qamrab oladi.
CSAA uchun kirish talabi buxgalteriya hi: The entry requirement for CSAA is a four-year university degree (from a university recognized by AAOIFI) or a recognized professional accounting qualification that includes courses in accounting, auditing, business or management and finance.
Bunday ma’lumotga ega bo‘lmagan nomzodla: Candidates who do not have such education will have to take the PRC (pre-requisite competency) exams. The PRC exam is based on the AAOIFI’s BRE and AAE study texts.
AAOIFI ilmiy darajalari ushbu shartlarda: AAOIFI will maintain and publish a list of universities whose academic degrees are exempt from these conditions.
CPSS — Certificate of Proficiency in Sha: CPSS — Certificate of Proficiency in Shari’ah Standards. Study of all Shari’ah standards developed by AAOIFI.
CPFAS — Certificate of Proficiency in Fi: CPFAS — Certificate of Proficiency in Financial Accounting Standards. AAOIFI's advanced professional qualification for specialists in Islamic financial accounting.
CPAAGE — Certificate of Proficiency in A: CPAAGE — Certificate of Proficiency in Audit, Assurance, Governance and Ethics. Covers all AAOIFI standards on Shari’ah auditing, governance, and ethics, including the Code of Ethics.
CIPA uchun kirish talabi buxgalteriya hi: The entry requirement for CIPA is a four-year university degree (from a university recognized by AAOIFI) or a recognized professional accounting qualification that includes courses in accounting, auditing, business or management and finance.
CIPA darajasi barcha uchta modul va amal: The CIPA fellowship is awarded upon successful completion of all three modules and practical experience requirements (PER). The PER is proven by provision of Employment Certificate issued by Human Resources of your organization with a detailed job description proving candidate’s accountancy-related work experience.
AAOIFI tashkilotining O‘zbekistondagi ra: Official land partner of AAOIFI in Uzbekistan
AAOIFI (Accounting and Auditing Organiza: AAOIFI (Accounting and Auditing Organization for Islamic Financial Institutions) is a leading international organization that publishes Islamic finance standards recognized in more than 50 countries worldwide.
Mos sertifikat dasturini tanlash: Selection of a suitable program for certification
Imtihonlarga tayyorgarlik ko‘rish: Receiving training materials for exam preparation
Imtihon topshirish (tanlangan dasturga q: Taking the exam (the dates will be announced additionally depending on the chosen program)
Yuqoridagi dasturlar bo‘yicha AAOIFI imt: AAOIFI exams for the below-mentioned programs are conducted by the Al Muamalat official examination center in Tashkent.
Al Muamalat Consulting AAOIFI (Accountin: Al Muamalat Consulting’s main objective is to contribute to the comprehensive development of Islamic finance in Uzbekistan and Central Asia. In this process, we take into account the interests of the countries and focus on ensuring compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
Shuningdek, Al Muamalat Consulting AAOIF: In addition, as an official AAOIFI land partner, Al Muamalat Consulting:
Professional tayyorlov kurslar tashkil e: Organizes professional preparatory courses for international certifications.
Al Muamalat test markazida imtihon topsh: Provides opportunities to sit examinations at the Al Muamalat Test Center.
Al Muamalat Consulting tomonidan barcha: All training courses delivered by Al Muamalat Consulting are conducted by qualified instructors with strong practical and theoretical experience.
AAOIFI is an international organization: AAOIFI is an international organization that develops accounting, auditing, and Shari'ah standards for Islamic financial institutions. Al Muamalat Consulting provides preparatory training courses for AAOIFI certifications in Islamic finance, covering accounting, auditing, and Shari'ah standards.
Al Muamalat Consulting is official partn: Al Muamalat Consulting is official partner of AAOIFI (Accounting and Auditing Organization for Islamic Financial Institutions) in Uzbekistan.
Provides the opportunity to sit examinat: Provides the opportunity to sit examinations at the Al Muamalat Test Center;
Offers registration discounts for AAOIFI: Offers registration discounts for AAOIFI examinations.

Strategic Solutions. Ethical Excellence, Global Impact.
President of the Republic of Uzbekistan: President of the Republic of Uzbekistan
The time has come to create a legal fram: 'The time has come to create a legal framework for the introduction of Islamic financial services in Uzbekistan. Experts from the Islamic Development Bank and other international financial organizations will be involved in this process.'
Mintaqa manfaatlari va amaldagi qoidalar: To contribute to the comprehensive development of Islamic finance in Uzbekistan and Central Asia, aligning with the region’s interests and existing regulations.
Innovatsion Islom moliyasi yechimlari or: To lead the transformation of the financial landscape in Central Asia through innovative Islamic finance solutions.
maxsus_text3: Mufti Ibrahim Essa is a recognized Shariah expert in Islamic banking and Takaful. He completed Dars-e-Nizami (Qur’an & Sunnah) and Takhassus fi’l-Ifta (specialization in Islamic jurisprudence) at Jamiah Darul Uloom Karachi, where he currently serves as a Member of Darul Ifta and has authored 5,000+ fatwas under the supervision of Mufti Muhammad Taqi Usmani. He chairs multiple Shariah boards, including Stearns Bank (USA), United Bank Limited (Pakistan), Hayat Bank (Uzbekistan), and Hamkor Bank (Uzbekistan), and serves as a Shariah advisor/board member to institutions in the USA, UK, and Pakistan (including Lloyd’s of London).
maxsus_text4: Abdulhamid Mahamatlatipovich Djumanov is an Islamic scholar, imam-khatib, and senior lecturer. He studied at the Tashkent Islamic Institute (2004–2008) and has served as imam-khatib at several jome (cathedral) mosques in Tashkent, including “Sulton Hoji,” “Dorus Salom,” “Islom Obod,” and currently “Dorul Omon.” He has also taught at the “Fakhriddin ar-Razi” Islamic educational institution in the Khorezm region. In 2019–2021, he completed his master’s studies at the University of Journalism and Mass Communications. He currently serves as imam-khatib of the “Dorul Omon” Jome Mosque and as a senior lecturer at the Tashkent Islamic educational institution.
Al Muamalat Consulting is an Uzbekistan-: Al Muamalat Consulting is an Uzbekistan-based consulting company specializing in Islamic finance, product structuring, innovative financial solutions and trainings on Islamic banking and finance for financial institutions.
We support conventional banks in establi: We support conventional banks in establishing Islamic banking windows, full-fledged Islamic finance institutions, and market stakeholders (regulators, auditors, and practitioners) through expert advisory services and capacity building.
